Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a game-winning, three-run home run off Brewers closer Devin Williams in the ninth inning
Starling Marte hit a double to drive Winkler home, and add another run for the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets will now face the Philadelphia Phillies in the NLDS, which begins Saturday at Citizens Bank Park.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NY Mets rallied in the 9th inning to beat the Milwaukee Brewers 4-2 in Game 3 of the Wild Card Series on Thursday night
